lead_paragraph: Kosovo was accepted as a member of UEFA on Tuesday, becoming the 55th member of European football's governing body despite strong opposition from neighbouring Serbia, from which it declared independence in 2008.

headline.print_headline: Kosovo Becomes Member of UEFA, Paves Way for FIFA Application
headline.main: Kosovo Becomes Member of UEFA, Paves Way for FIFA Application
